name: accountswizard
description: AccountsWizard/ │ ├── index.html           → Homepage (Hero, intro, navigation to lessons) ├── lessons.html         → Accounting lessons page ├── quiz.html            → Interactive quiz page ├── about.html           → About/Contact page │ ├── css/ │   └── style.css        → Main stylesheet for the whole site │ ├── js/ │   └── script.js        → Global interactivity (animations, menu, etc.) │ ├── assets/ │   ├── images/          → Icons, illustrations, graphics │   ├── fonts/           → (Optional) Custom fonts │   └── sounds/          → (Optional) Click sounds, effects │ └── data/     └── quiz-data.json   → Questions for quizzes (optional, but makes expansion easier)
